en.platformDescription: A platform that facilitates efficient and organized one-on-one student counseling appointments
en.signUp: Sign up to become a member!
en.course1: COM 525 Introduction to Human Computer Interaction
en.course3: CSE 219 Object Oriented Programming & Data Structures
en.searchPlaceholder: Search for tutors or units of study
en.course1Description: This course introduces HCI user-centered practice. The course will cover both theoretical and practical applications of Human-Computer Interaction concepts. This course covers five interrelated themes: issue analysis, idea generation, prototype, implementation, and evaluation. This course will teach you effective strategies for understanding people and recognizing design opportunities. You will learn about the features of effective interfaces and tools for prototype and implementation. You will assess and improve your designs throughout the process. Effective communication of your vision or product specifications to stakeholders will be covered in this course.

zh_CN.platformDescription: 一个促进高效和有组织的一对一学生咨询预约的平台
zh_CN.course3: CSE 219 面向对象编程与数据结构
zh_CN.course1Description: 本课程介绍了以用户为中心的HCI实践。课程将涵盖人机交互概念的理论和实践应用。该课程涵蓋五個相互關聯的主題：問題分析、創意生成、原型、實現和評估。这门课程将教你有效的策略，以理解人們和识別設計機會。你将学习到有效界面的特点和原型及实施的工具。你将在整个过程中评估和改进你的设计。该课程还将涵盖如何有效地将你的愿景或产品规格传达给利益相关者。

zh_TW.platformDescription: 一個促進高效和有組織的一對一學生咨詢預約的平台
zh_TW.course3: CSE 219 面向對象編程與數據結構
zh_TW.course1Description: 本課程介紹了以用戶為中心的HCI實踐。課程將涵蓋人機互動概念的理論和實踐應用。該課程涵蓋五個相互關聯的主題：問題分析、創意生成、原型、實現和評估。這門課程將教你有效的策略，以理解人們和識別設計機會。你將學習到有效界面的特點和原型及實施的工具。你將在整個過程中評估和改進你的設計。該課程還將涵蓋如何有效地將你的願景或產品規格傳達給利益相關者。
